data.fullContent: Enriching science students through technology is made possible by the wide array of interactive resources available on the web. Students can conduct an in depth and interactive study of Biology at Interactive Biology. Chemistry students can expand on textbook information with information and animations on periodic table elements by using The Visual Elements Periodic Table. Students of physics can enrich the learning experience by spending time at The Physics Classroom.
data.answer: 通过技术来丰富理科生的学习是有可能的，因为网络上有各种各样的互动资源。学生可以在互动生物学中进行深入、互动的生物学习。化学专业的学生可以利用元素周期表上的信息和动画扩展教材信息。物理专业的学生可以花时间在物理课堂上，丰富学习经验。
